parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description:
The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request.

You can use the client to generate the value, but you must make sure that it is unique among different requests. The token can contain only ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length.

>  If you do not set this parameter, **ClientToken** is set to the value of **RequestId**. The value of **RequestId** for each API request may be different.

parameters.name: DryRun
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to perform a dry run. Valid values:

*   **true**: performs a dry run. The system checks the required parameters, request syntax, and limits. If the request fails the dry run, an error message is returned. If the request passes the dry run, the `DryRunOperation` error code is returned.
*   **false:**: performs a dry run and sends the request.

parameters.name: NewResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group to which you want to move the CEN instance or bandwidth plan.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The type of the resource. Valid values:

*   **CEN**: CEN instance
*   **bandwidthpackage**: bandwidth plan
